message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to start our negotiation. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $1200000. This is a great opportunity to get a fantastic deal, and I believe you'll love the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the discount. I would like to counteroffer at $1100000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $1150000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I believe it's a great opportunity for us to come to an agreement.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to counteroffer at $1125000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to ensure I get a good deal. I'm willing to offer the product for $1140000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort. I would like to counteroffer at $1135000.

I'm surprised by your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to prioritize my own interests. I'm willing to offer the product for $1145000. This is my last offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thank you for your last offer, Alice. I understand your position. I would like to counteroffer at $1140000.

I'm getting close to my limit, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to prioritize my own interests. I'm willing to offer the product for $1150000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
Alice, thank you for your final offer. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to counteroffer at $1145000.
